name: Oil Firing Technical Association
goal:
To represent UK and Republic of Ireland liquid fuel fired heating and cooking equipment manufacturers to Governments and the EC

To represent installers of liquid fuel, solid fuel and renewable heating technologies, on the OFTEC competent persons scheme register, to Governments and the EC.

To devise ways in which homes in the UK and Republic of Ireland can be heated, whist reducing energy demand and the production of Green House Gases
euInitiatives: Energy of buildings and heating systems, competition and climate change
